title: METALLICA NIGHT BBC RADIO 1
description:
Metallica Night on BBC Radio 1
Monday, 15th September 2008

PT 1- 7:00pm Zane Lowe kicks off an evening dedicated to one of the world's biggest rock bands. He'll be chatting to the band and playing some special Metallica covers and remixes.

PT 2- 9:00pm Metallica live and exclusive for Radio 1 with highlights from last night's intimate gig - their first ever recording for the station.

01. That was Just Your Life
02. The End Of The Line
03. Until It Sleeps
04. Broken, Beat, and Scarred
05. Cyanide
06. Frantic
07. For Whom The Bells Tolls
08. Kirk Solo
09. The Day That Never Comes
10. Master Of Puppets
11. Blackened

PT 3- 11:00pm Radio 1's Daniel P Carter tells the complete story of Metallica from 1981 onwards incl. a 60 minute documentary about the band featuring brand new and archive interviews with every member of the band.

http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b00dndph" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
